name: Prestidigitation
flavor: You perform an amusing magical trick, such as creating a dancing wisp of light, freshening a wilting flower, making a coin invisible, or warming a cold drink.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
Use this cantrip to accomplish one of the effects given below.
✦ Move up to 1 pound of material.
✦ Create a harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint music, or a strong odor.
✦ Color, clean, or soil items in 1 cubic foot for up to 1 hour.
✦ Instantly light (or snuff out) a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.
✦ Chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 pound of nonliving material for up to 1 hour.
✦ Make a small mark or symbol appear on a surface for up to 1 hour.
✦ Produce out of nothingness a small item or image that exists until the end of your next turn.
✦ Make a small, handheld item invisible until the end of your next turn.
Nothing you create with this cantrip can deal damage, serve as a weapon or a tool, or hinder another creature’s actions. This cantrip cannot duplicate the effect of any other power.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: You can have as many as three prestidigitation effects active at one time.

name: Piercing Strike
flavor: A needle-sharp point slips past armor and into tender flesh.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier at 21st level.

name: Chaos Bolt
flavor: A bolt of many-colored light leaps from your hand and screams toward an enemy’s head.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

**Secondary Attack**: Charisma vs. Will

**Hit**: 1d6 psychic damage. If you rolled an even number for the secondary attack roll, repeat the secondary attack. You can attack a creature only once with a single use of this power.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
**Wild Magic**: If you rolled an even number for the
primary attack roll, make a secondary attack.

targets.target: One creature within 5 squares of the target last hit by this power

name: Scorching Burst
flavor: A vertical column of golden flames burns all within.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.
Increase damage to 2d6 + Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

name: Leading Strike
flavor: You show an ally how to hit your foe where it hurts.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. One ally adjacent to you or the target gains a bonus to his or her next damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: When you use this power, one ally within 5 squares of you gains a +1 bonus to the next attack roll they make before the start of your next turn.

name: Bolstering Strike
flavor: You attack your foe without mercy or reprieve, and your accuracy is rewarded with a divine gift of vigor.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Charisma modifier at 21st level.

name: Thunderwave
flavor: You create a whip-crack of sonic power that lashes up from the ground.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Increase damage to 2d6 + Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

name: Fleeting Ghost
flavor: You are stealthy and fleet of foot at the same time.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Stealth.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You can move your speed and make a Stealth check. You do not take the normal penalty from movement on this check.

name: Insidious Distraction
flavor: Your weapon attack lets you sink psychic fangs into your foe’s mind, crippling its ability to think and act.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1 [W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed and slowed until the end ofyour next turn.

sections.title: Special
sections.content:
**Augment 2**

**Hit:** 1[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed and immobilized until the end of your next turn.

name: Divine Guidance
flavor: You lend your deity’s guidance to an ally’s attack against your foe.
trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you makes an attack roll against your _oath of enmity_ target

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The target makes a second attack roll and uses either result.

name: Words of Friendship
flavor: You infuse your words with arcane power, transforming even the simplest speech into compelling oratory.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You gain a +5 power bonus to the next Diplomacy check you make before the end of your next turn.

name: Torturous Strike
flavor: If you twist the blade in the wound just so, you can make your enemy howl in pain.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

**Brutal Scoundrel**: You gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Strength modifier.

name: Piercing Smite
flavor: Silvery spikes cover your weapon, punching through your foe's armor.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target and a number of enemies adjacent to you equal to your Wisdom modifier are marked until the end of your next turn.

name: Avalanche Strike
flavor: You drop your guard and put all your strength into a devastating overhead swing.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

**Rageblood Vigor:** The attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Until the start of your next turn, any attacker gains a +4 bonus to attack rolls against you.

name: Combat Sprint
flavor: Having saved a bit of strength for just this moment, you burst across the battlefield.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You move your speed +4. You gain a +4 bonus to all defenses against any opportunity attack you provoke with this movement.

name: Bait and Switch
flavor: You strike and weave, causing your foe to lurch forward so that you can duck around him and slip into his space.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. In addition, you switch places with the target and can then shift 1 square. 

**Artful Dodger**: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

name: Halo of Fire
flavor: A circle of flame erupts around your foe, harming any other enemy that moves near the creature.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier fire damage. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to the target takes 5 fire damage.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: Censure of Retribution: The fire damage equals 5 + your Intelligence modifier.

name: Fire Shroud
flavor: With a subtle gesture, you wreathe nearby enemies in flames.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

name: Fey Switch
flavor: You step through the veils of the Feywild to the place where an ally stands and return to the world in that spot. Your ally is instantly whisked back to the place you started from.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You and your ally trade spaces.

name: Imperiling Strike
flavor: You deal a staggering blow, opening a hole in your enemy’s defenses.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a –1 penalty to AC and Reflex defense until the end of your next turn.

**Brutal Scoundrel**: The penalty to AC and Reflex defense is equal to your Strength modifier.

name: Strengthen the Faithful
flavor: You utter a solemn prayer as you bring your weapon down upon your foe, invoking the power of your deity to physically bolster you and nearby allies.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you and each ally adjacent to the target can spend a healing surge. Add your Charisma modifier to the hit points regained.

name: Lightning Bolt
flavor: From your outstretched hand erupt brilliant strokes of blue-white lightning.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

sections.title: Secondary Hit
sections.content: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

targets.target: Two creatures within 10 squares of the primary target

name: Storm Cage
flavor: You trap your enemies in a cage made of lightning and filled with roaring thunder.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 4d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning and thunder damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You conjure a wall in the 16 outer squares of the burst (forming a square enclosure). Any creature that starts its turn adjacent to the wall or moves into a wall square takes 10 lightning damage. Moving into a wall square costs 1 extra square of movement. The wall does not grant cover or concealment. It lasts until the end of your next turn.

name: Thunderlance
flavor: A thunderous pulse of concussive energy rolls from your hand, bowling over your enemies.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 4d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 4 squares.

name: Combust
flavor: You cause several foes to spontaneously burst into flame.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 5d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

name: Deceptive Shadows
flavor: Darkness swirls around your foes, distracting them and cloaking you and your allies from view.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target can gain line of sight only to the creature nearest to it (ally or enemy). If multiple creatures are equally near to the target, it can see all of them.

name: Rage Strike
flavor: You channel your primal rage into a devastating attack.
requirements: You must be raging and have at least one unused barbarian rage power.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
You deal damage based on the level of the rage power you expend:

_1st level:_ 3[W] + Strength modifier
_5th level:_ 4[W] + Strength modifier
_9th level:_ 5[W] + Strength modifier
_15th level:_ 6[W] + Strength modifier
_19th level:_ 7[W] + Strength modifier
_25th level:_ 8[W] + Strength modifier
_29th level:_ 9[W] + Strength modifier

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: You can use this power twice per day.

targets.attack: Strength vs. AC. To make this attack, you expend an unused barbarian rage power.

name: Oath of the Final Duel
flavor: You swear an oath that you will slay the foe before you. As long as you work to fulfill this oath, that foe cannot escape.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Until the end of the encounter, if the target is more than 3 squares away from you at the start of your turn, you can teleport to a space within 3 squares of it as a minor action. This effect ends if you end your turn more than 3 squares away from the target.

name: Dread Star
flavor: You create a fist-sized orb of painful blue-white radiance that whirls around your enemy, searing him. Fierce rays shoot from it like jabbing daggers of light, fencing him in where he stands.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3d6 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The target takes a -2 penalty to Will defense (save ends).

name: Blessing of Vengeance
flavor: With the death of your foe, your god grants you a boon.
trigger: Your oath of enmity target drops to 0 hit points.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You gain temporary hit points equal to your healing surge value.

name: Song of Courage
flavor: Your magic creates shouts of encouragement, making it seem as though an entire army were cheering on your allies.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
The burst creates a zone of inspirational shouts that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you.
While within the zone, any ally gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls.

name: Serpentine Blast
flavor: ￼￼￼A bolt of lightning leaps from your fingers to strike at your foe, twisting past obstacles.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3d10 + Charisma modifier lightning damage.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage.

targets.attack: Charisma vs. Reflex. The attack ignores cover and concealment, but not superior cover or total concealment.

name: Splintering Shot
flavor: Your arrow burrows into flesh and shatters, sending splinters of wood deep into the wound.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and the target takes a -1 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

name: Satire of Bravery
flavor: Your verse mocks your foes' courage, forcing them to become the cowards you describe.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is affected by your satire of bravery (save ends). While the target is affected by the satire, if the target ends its turn closer to you than where it started its turn, the target takes 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage and is dazed until the end of its next turn.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You push the target 3 squares.

name: Divine Bodyguard
flavor: As your weapon connects with your enemies, so too does the magic of your god connect you to your allies.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Choose an ally within 5 squares of you. You take half that ally's damage until the end of the encounter or until you end the effect as a free action. No power or effect can reduce the damage you take from this power.

name: Cure Serious Wounds
flavor: You utter a simple prayer and gain the power to instantly heal wounds, and your touch momentarily suffuses you or a wounded creature with bright silver light.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The target regains hit points as if it had spent two healing surges.

name: Adamantine Echo
flavor: You unleash a thunderous roar to batter your enemies, and scales like those of an adamantine dragon cover your skin.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d6 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and ongoing 5 thunder damage (save ends).

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Ongoing 5 thunder damage (save ends).

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
You gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of the encounter.

**Dragon Magic**: The power bonus to AC equals your Strength modifier.

name: Resistence
flavor: You make yourself or another creature in range resistant to a particular kind of damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Against a particular damage type chosen by you, the target gains resistance equal to your level + your Intelligence modifier until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes. Choose the damage type from the following list: acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder.

name: Garrote Grip
flavor: The more your enemy struggles, the less you want to let him go.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.
sustainText: Sustain the grab for another round. The third time you sustain the grab after using this power, the target falls unconscious.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you grab the target. Until the target escapes, you have cover, and any melee attack or ranged attack that misses you hits the target instead.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: You can use this power as a minor action if you have already grabbed a creature. Doing so requires no attack roll.

name: Iron Warrior
flavor: Like a tankard of bad ale, you don't go down easy.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You spend a healing surge, regain additional hit points equal to 2d6 + your Constitution modifier, and make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.

name: Cloudkill
flavor: Yellow-green vapors emerge from the ground with a hiss, forming a thick, toxic cloud.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier poison damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The burst creates a zone of poisonous vapors that lasts until the end of your next turn. A creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes 1d10 + Intelligence modifier poison damage. As a move action, you can move the zone 3 squares.

name: Mass Fly
flavor: White motes of light fly from your fingertips and swirl about, lifting you and your allies off the ground and granting each of you the power of flight.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: All targets gain a speed of fly 8 until the end of your next turn.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: You can sustain this power until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes. If you don’t sustain this power, all targets float to the ground without taking falling damage.

targets.target: You and each ally in burst

name: Cinder Storm
flavor: A spinning cloud of flaming ash surrounds your enemies, burning them and blinding their allies
trigger: Secondary Attack Trigger: A creature fails its saving throw against this power's ongoing damage.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 5d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

sections.title: Secondary Hit
sections.content:
Opportunity Action - Close burst 5

1d8 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and the secondary target is blinded until the end of its next turn.

name: No Mercy
flavor: Let nothing stand between a warrior and the object of his wrath.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 7[W] + Strength modifier damage.

name: Ghost Sound
flavor: With a wink, you create an illusory sound that emanates from somewhere close by.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You cause a sound as quiet as a whisper or as loud as a yelling or fighting creature to emanate from the target. You can produce nonvocal sounds such as the ringing of a sword blow, jingling armor, or scraping stone. If you whisper, you can whisper quietly enough that only creatures adjacent to the target can hear your words.

name: Deft Strike
flavor: A final lunge brings you into an advantageous position.
requirements: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier at 21st level.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: You can move 2 squares before the attack.

name: Burning Spray
flavor: You fling your arm in a wide arc, casting liquid fire at your foes.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.

Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: **Dragon Magic**: The next enemy that hits you with a melee attack before the end of your next turn takes fire damage equal to your Strength modifier.

name: Magic Missile
flavor: You launch a silvery bolt of force at an enemy.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
2d4 + Intelligence modifier force damage.
Increase damage to 4d4 + Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: This power counts as a ranged basic attack. When a power allows you to make a ranged basic attack, you can use this power.

name: Radiant Vengeance
flavor: Calling on the power of your deity, you transfer the pain of your wounds to a foe and regain some resilience.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Level 21: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.

name: Tide of Iron
flavor: After each mighty swing, you bring your shield to bear and use it to push your enemy back.
requirements: You must be using a shield.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square if it is your size, smaller than you, or one size category larger. You can shift into the space that the target occupied.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.

name: Cloud of Daggers
flavor: You create a small cloud of whirling daggers of force that relentlessly attack creatures in the area.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage.

Increase damage to 2d6 + Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The power's area is filled with sharp daggers of force. Any creature that enters the area or starts it turn there takes force damage equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1). The cloud remains in place until the end of your next turn. You can dispel it earlier as a minor action.

name: Recuperating Strike
flavor: Nothing restores your will to fight more than slamming your weapon into a foe. Each swing gives you more will to press on.
requirements: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. If you are raging, the number of temporary hit points you gain equals 5 + your Constitution modifier.

_Level 11:_ 1[W] + 1d6 + Strength modifier damage.
_Level 21:_ 2[W] + 2d6 + Strength modifier damage.

name: Shadow Stride
flavor: You silently step from shadow to shadow, slipping past your foes unseen and unheard.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Stealth.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You must be hiding to use this power. You can move your speed. At the end of that movement, if you have cover, you can make a Stealth check with no penalty for moving. If you make the Stealth check, you stay hidden during your movement.

name: Swift Charge
flavor: As your foe falls, you rush toward your next victim.
trigger: Your attack reduces an enemy to 0 hit points

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You charge an enemy.

name: Majestic Word
flavor: You utter words laden with preternatural inspiration, restoring your ally's stamina and making wounds seem insignificant.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
The target can spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier. You also slide the target one square.

_Level 6:_ 1d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.
_Level 11:_ 2d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.
_Level 16:_ 3d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.
_Level 21:_ 4d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.
_Level 26:_ 5d6 + Charisma modifier additional hit points.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: You can use this power twice per encounter, but only once per round. At 16th level, you can use this power three times per encounter, but only once per round.

targets.target: You or one ally in burst

name: Positioning Strike
flavor: A false stumble and a shove place the enemy exactly where you want him.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

*Artful Dodger*: You slide the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

name: Covering Attack
flavor: You launch a dizzying barrage of thrusts at your enemy, compelling him to give you all his attention. Under the cover of your ferocious attack, one of your allies can safely retreat from that same foe.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an ally adjacent to the target can shift 2 squares.

name: Blunder
flavor: You fog your foe's mind, causing it to stumble past your allies.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. During the slide, you or one of your allies can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action, with a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.

**Virtue of Cunning:** The power bonus to the attack roll equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

name: Tumble
flavor: You tumble out of harm’s way, dodging the opportunistic attacks of your enemies.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Acrobatics.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You can shift a number of squares equal to one-half your speed.

name: Disruptive Strike
flavor: You thwart an enemy's attack with a timely thrust of your blade or a quick shot from your bow.
trigger: You or an ally is attacked by a creature

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged). The target takes a penalty to its attack roll for the triggering attack equal to 3 + Wisdom modifier.

targets.attack: Strength +2 vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity + 2 vs. AC (ranged).

name: Dancing Lightning
flavor: As lightning strikes your foe, thunder batters creatures around it.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d10 + Charisma modifier lightning damage, and each creature adjacent to the target takes thunder damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

name: Eldritch Rain
flavor: You fire purple rays of eldritch power at your foes.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d10 + Charisma modifier damage.

**Fey Pact:** Gain a bonus to each attack's damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

targets.target: One creature, or two creatures no more than 5 squares apart from each other
targets.attack: Charisma vs. Reflex, one attack per target

name: Lightning Shift
flavor: With a flourish of snapping sparks, your single step speeds you, lightning quick, across the battlefield.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You shift your speed. You ignore difficult terrain during the shift.

name: Cloud of Steel
flavor: You shower your enemies in sharp metal.
requirements: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

targets.target: Each enemy in blast you can see

name: Blade Step
flavor: As you strike one foe, you teleport next to another.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you teleport 10 squares to a space that must be adjacent to an enemy.

name: Mire the Mind
flavor: You assail your foe's mind with unreal images until he can see nothing else.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you and all of your allies in range are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.

**Fey Pact:** You gain a power bonus to Stealth checks equal to your Intelligence modifier until the end of the encounter.

name: Spirit's Eclipse
flavor: A mental bulwark helps to protect you against your foe's attack and renders the creature incapable of seeing you for a time.
trigger: An enemy hits you with an attack that targets Will.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +5 bonus to Will and are invisible to the triggering enemy.

name: Unbalancing Attack
flavor: Ducking and weaving, you land a decisive blow that staggers your foe and sets it up for a tripping attack.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target cannot shift until the end of your next turn. If the target provokes an opportunity attack from you before the start of your next turn, you gain a bonus to the attack roll and damage roll with the opportunity attack equal to your Strength modifier, and you knock the target prone on a hit.

name: Hounding Strike
flavor: With snarling ferocity, you attack. Your weapon bites deep into your enemy’s flesh, filling his heart with doubt.
requirements: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you gain combat advantage against the target and a +1 power bonus to all defenses against its attacks.

**Artful Dodge**r: The power bonus is equal to your Charisma modifier.

name: Hack 'n' Slash
flavor: You swing your weapon in deadly arcs, mercilessly hacking and slashing at your foe's armor until finally you break through.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: Weapon: If you're wielding an axe, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier.

name: Black Fire
flavor: A blast of crackling black fire erupts from your hand, charring the flesh and burning the souls of your foes.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 6d6 + Intelligence modifier fire and necrotic damage.

name: Lightning Breath
flavor: ￼You exhale a blast of lightning at your foes. The lightning then forms a ring around you, repelling nearby attackers.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3d8 + Charisma modifier lightning damage.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
Until the end of your next turn, whenever an enemy hits you with a melee attack, you push that enemy 1 square.

**Dragon Magic**: The enemy also takes 5 lightning damage.

name: Split the Tree
flavor: You fire two arrows at once, which separate in mid-flight to strike two different targets.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

targets.target: Two creatures within 3 squares of each other
targets.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. Make two attack rolls, take the higher result, and apply it to both targets.

name: Bloodhunt Rage
flavor: Your rage surges up from the depths of your pain to bring pain to the wounded.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You enter the rage of the bloodhunt. Until the rage ends, you gain a bonus to melee damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier if either you or your target is bloodied.

name: Boundless Endurance
flavor: You shake off the worst of your wounds.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You gain regeneration 2 + your Constitution modifier when you are bloodied.

name: Walking Wounded
flavor: You topple your enemy with a crippling blow and force him to stumble around the battlefield.
requirements: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone. Until the end of the encounter, if the target moves more than half its speed in a single action, it falls prone at the end of its movement.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and the target is not knocked prone.

name: Sign of Vulnerability
flavor: You cause a nearby foe to convulse with pain and render it more susceptible to radiant energy.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target gains vulnerability 5 to radiant damage until the end of the encounter.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and the target gains no vulnerability.

name: Web
flavor: You call into being a giant web made of thick magical strands that hand in midair, trapping those within it.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: The target is immobilized (save ends).

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The burst creates a zone of webs that fills the area until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes. The zone is considered difficult terrain. Any creature that ends it move in the web is immobilized (save ends).

name: Defensive Training
flavor: With a soldier's discipline, you fend off attacks that would overcome a lesser person.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Gain a +2 power bonus to your Fortitude, Reflex or Will defense.

name: Dispel Magic
flavor: You unleash a ray of crackling arcane energy that destroys a magical effect created by an opponent.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: The conjuration or the zone is destroyed. All its effects end, including those that normally last until a target saves.

targets.attack: Intelligence vs. the Will defense of the creator of the conjuration or the zone

name: Knockout
flavor: A well-placed blow takes your foe out of the fight.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is knocked unconscious (save ends). If the unconscious target takes any damage, it is no longer unconscious.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

name: Blur
flavor: You cloak yourself with a shimmering aura, making your outline almost impossible to discern.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses, and enemies 5 or more squares away from you cannot see you.

name: Bloody Path
flavor: You dash across the battlefield, leaving bewildered and bleeding enemies in your wake.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You can move your speed. Every enemy that can make an opportunity attack against you as a result of this movement attacks itself with its opportunity attack, rather than you. Any enemy that can make an opportunity attack against you during this movement must do so. It cannot refrain from making the attack to avoid harming itself.

name: Raise the Stakes
flavor: You focus on the precision of your attacks, at the expense of hiding the chinks in your own armor.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Bluff.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Until the end of your next turn, any of your attacks can score a critical hit on a roll of 17–20, and any attack against you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20.

name: Devastation's Wake
flavor: You thrash your foes with a devastating array of strikes, and then unleash your fury a second time against anyone left standing.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage.

sections.title: Secondary Hit
sections.content: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.

targets.target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Any enemy that moves adjacent to you or starts its turn adjacent to you

name: No Surrender
flavor: You refuse to go down, turning a death blow into one last chance for victory.
trigger: Your hit points drop to 0 or lower

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You regain hit points to bring you to one-half your maximum hit points. However, you take a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

name: Bubbling Acid
flavor: You toss a green toward your enemies. It explodes, showering them with acid and creating a boiling pool of caustic stuff that moves at your command.
trigger: Secondary Action Trigger: A creature enters the zone or starts its turn there. (This is an Opportunity Action, Close Burst 1).

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 6d6 + Intelligence modifier acid damage.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage.

sections.title: Secondary Hit
sections.content: The secondary target is blinded until the end of its current turn.

name: Visions of Wrath
flavor: With blood-curdling cries, your enemies fall upon each other.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: The target is dominated (save ends). If you do not compel the target to make any attack rolls during its turn, it automatically saves to end this condition at the end of that turn. If you compel the target to make any attack rolls but it does not hit any creatures, it automatically fails saving throws against this condition until the start of its next turn.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: The target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

name: Mage Hand
flavor: You gesture toward an object nearby, and a spectral floating hand lifts the object into the air and moves it where you wish.
sustainText: You can sustain the hand indefinitely.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
You conjure a spectral, floating hand in an unoccupied square within range. The hand picks up, moves, or manipulates an adjacent object weighing 20 pounds or less and carries it up to 5 squares. If you are holding the object when you use this power, the hand can move the object into a pack, a pouch, a sheath, or a similar container and simultaneously move any one object carried or worn anywhere on your body into your hand.
As a move action, you can move the hand up to 5 squares. As a free action, you can cause the hand to drop an object it is holding, and as a minor action, you can cause the hand to pick up or manipulate a different object.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: You can create only one hand at a time.

name: Righteous Brand
flavor: You smite your foe with your weapon and brand it with a ghostly, glowing symbol of your deity's anger. By naming one of your allies when the symbol appears, you add divine power to that ally's attacks against the branded foe.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one ally within 5 squares of you gains a power bonus to melee attack rolls against the target equal to your Strength modifier until the end of your next turn.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.

name: Acid Orb
flavor: You hurl a globe of acid at a distant enemy.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d10 + Charisma modifier acid damage.

Level 21: 2d10 + Charisma modifier acid damage.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: This power can be used as a ranged basic attack.

name: Eyebite
flavor: You glare at your enemy, and your eyes briefly gleam with brilliant colors. Your foe reels under your mental assault, and you vanish from his sight.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you are invisible to the target until the start of your next turn.

Increase damage to 2d6 + Charisma modifier at 21st level.

name: Dual Strike
flavor: You lash out quickly and follow up faster, delivering two small wounds.
requirements: You must be wielding two melee weapons.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] damage per attack.
Increase damage to 2[W] per attack at 21st level.

targets.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks

name: Sure Strike
flavor: You trade power for precision.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] damage.

Increase damage to 2[W] at 21st level.

name: Nimble Strike
flavor: You slink past your enemy's guard to make your attack, or you make your attack and then withdraw to a more advantageous position.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier at 21st level.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: Shift 1 square before or after you attack.

name: Devastating Strike
flavor: You strike with awesome power, more concerned with offensive strength than defensive posturing.
requirements: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + 1d8 + Strength modifier damage.
_Level 11:_ 1[W] + 2d8 + Strength modifier damage.
_Level21:_ 2[W] + 3d8 + Strength modifier damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Until the start of your next turn, any attack gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls against you. If you are raging, attackers do not gain this bonus.

name: Nimble Climb
flavor: You climb surfaces with astounding ease.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Athletics.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Make an Athletics check to climb a surface. You can move at your full speed during this climb.

name: Roar of Triumph
flavor: Your howl of victory shakes your enemies to the core, as they know your blood thirst is not yet quenched.
trigger: Your attack reduces an enemy to 0 hit points

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Each target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

name: Oath of Enmity
flavor: You focus your wrath on a single foe, giving your attacks against it extraordinary accuracy.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
When you make a melee attack against the target and the target is the only enemy adjacent to you, you make two attack rolls and use either result. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter or until the target drops to 0 hit points, at which point you regain the use of this power.

If another effect lets you roll twice and use the higher result when making an attack roll, this power has no effect on that attack. If an effect forces you to roll twice and use the lower result when making an attack roll, this power has no effect on that attack either.

If an effect lets you reroll an attack roll and you rolled twice because of this power, you reroll both dice.

targets.target: One enemy you can see in burst

name: King's Castle
flavor: It’s hard to get to the little guy when he takes cover behind an ally who can crush plate armor in his teeth.
requirements: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Switch places with a willing adjacent ally.

name: Divine Glow
flavor: Murmuring a prayer to your deity, you invoke a blast of white radiance from your holy symbol. Foes burn in its stern light, but your allies are heartened and guided by it.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Allies in the blast gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

name: Icy Terrain
flavor: With frosty breath, you utter a single arcane word that creates a treacherous patch of ice on the ground, hampering your foes.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is knocked prone.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The power's area is difficult terrain until the end of your next turn. You can end this effect as a minor action.

name: Shield
flavor: You throw up your hand, and a shield of arcane energy springs into existence, protecting you against imminent attacks.
trigger: You are hit by an attack

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You gain a +4 bonus to AC and Reflex defense until the end of your next turn.

name: Yield Ground
flavor: Even as your foe connects, you leap backward, out of the way of further harm.
trigger: An enemy damages you with a melee attack

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier. Gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

name: Trickster's Blade
flavor: You land an expert blow and follow up with a clever series of feints that bewilder your enemies.
requirements: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Add your Charisma modifier to your AC until the start of your next turn.

name: Arcing Smite
flavor: You swing your weapon in a wide arc that strikes not one but two creatures within your reach.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.

targets.attack: Strength vs. AC, one attack per target

name: Slippery Mind
flavor: You cloud your mind with vague thoughts that shield you against a sudden mental attack.
trigger: You are hit by an attack against your Will defense.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Bluff.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Gain a +2 power bonus to your Will defense against the triggering attack.

name: Mob Mentality
flavor: When it comes to lying, cajoling, or persuading others, your allies follow your lead.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Intimidate.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The targets gain a +2 power bonus to Charisma based skill and ability checks until the end of your next turn.

targets.target: You and each ally in burst

name: Thunder Wyrm's Jaws
flavor: You emit a draconic roar.An echo of the call bursts over your foe's head, buffeting your enemy as the sound bolsters you.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage. You gain temporary hit points equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier.

name: Hawk's Talon
flavor: Like the hawk, you strike with calculated precision.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged).

targets.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged). Gain a power bonus to this attack equal to your Wisdom modifier. Ignore any penalties from cover or concealment (but not superior cover or total concealment).

name: Dangerous Theft
flavor: You snatch an item from an enemy during combat.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Thievery.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: On your next action, ignore the –10 penalty when you make a Thievery check to pick a pocket during combat.

name: Tornado Strike
flavor: Your weapon becomes a blur as you make swift, sweeping attacks against two foes, then hastily slip away.
requirements: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.

**Artful Dodger**: You slide the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You can move 3 squares after making the attack.

targets.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, one attack per target

name: Hide in Plain Sight
flavor: You stand unseen in the midst of the battle, striking from your place of hiding.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Stealth.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You must already be hidden to use this power. You are invisible until you leave your current square. No other action that you perform makes you visible.

name: Chain Lightning
flavor: From your fingertips springs a tremendous stroke of blinding purple-white lightning that leaps from one enemy to another.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 4d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

sections.title: Secondary Hit
sections.content: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

sections.title: Special
sections.content:
Tertiary Targets: All other enemies within 20 squares of you.
Attack: Intelligence vs. Reflex
Hit: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

targets.target: Two creatures within 5 squares of the primary target.

name: Indomitable Battle Strike
flavor: You will not be denied your enemy's blood, and other foes that witness your savage attack know the ill fate that awaits them.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: All of your enemies within 10 squares of you are marked until the end of your next turn.

name: Trick Strike
flavor: Through a series of feints and lures, you maneuver your foe right where you want him.
requirements: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Until the end of the encounter, each time you hit the target you slide it 1 square.

name: On Pain of Death
flavor: You invoke prayer that wracks your foe with terrible pain and causes further pain whenever he makes an attack.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3d8 + Charisma modifier damage. Once per round, the target takes 1d8 damage after making any attacks on its turn (save ends).

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage. Once per round, the target takes 1d4 damage after making any attacks on its turn (save ends).

name: Stirring Shout
flavor: Your shout of wrath stabs into your foe's mind. Each time your allies hit that foe, they draw strength from its weakness.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an ally hits the target, that ally regains hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

name: Elemental Shift
flavor: The alignment of elements within you changes at your command.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
You can change the resistance granted by your Dragon Soul or Wild Soul to one of the other damage types for the rest of the encounter. In addition, one ally adjacent to you gains resist 5 to the damage type that you resist until the end of the encounter.

Level 11: Resist 10.

Level 21: Resist 15.

name: Deep Cut
flavor: Each drop of blood is another nail in your enemy’s coffin.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing damage equal to 5 + your Strength modifier (save ends).

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and no ongoing damage.

name: Crack the Shell
flavor: You break through your enemy's armor and deal a painful bleeding wound.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 damage and a -2 penalty to AC (save ends both).

name: Bigby's Icy Grasp
flavor: You conjure a giant floating hand made of chiseled ice that clutches foes and freezes them.
sustainText: A target grabbed by the hand takes 1d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage when you sustain this power. As a standard action, you can attack another target with the hand, but it must release a target it has grabbed.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the hand grabs the target. If the target attempts to escape, the hand uses your Fortitude or Reflex defense.

targets.target: One creature adjacent to the hand

name: Fire Shield
flavor: You are swathed in rippling flames that turn away both fire and chill but scorch anyone who strikes you.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You gain resist 10 cold and resist 10 fire until the end of the encounter. Whenever a creature make a melee attack roll against you, it takes 2d6 + your Intelligence modifier fire damage. No creature can take this damage more than once per turn.

name: Trickster's Healing
flavor: Your magic turns an enemy's blunder into an opportunity for your allies to overcome their wounds.
trigger: An attack misses an ally within 10 squares of you.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Each target regains hit points equal to one-half your level + your Intelligence modifier.

targets.target: Each ally in burst missed by the triggering attack

name: Deadly Positioning
flavor: You adroitly outmaneuver your enemy, pushing and baiting him with every stride and strike.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Until the end of the encounter, as long as you are adjacent to the target, you slide the target 1 square before making a melee attack against it.

targets.attack: You slide the target to any other square adjacent to you, and then make a Dexterity vs. AC attack.

name: Close Quarters
flavor: You take cover beneath a much larger creature, making it harder for the creature to hit you.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Acrobatics.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Move into the space of an adjacent creature larger than you and at least Large in size. (It gets its usual oppor- tunity attack against you as you leave an adjacent square.) You gain combat advantage against the creature, and it takes a –4 penalty to attack rolls against you. When the creature moves, you move along with it, staying in the same portion of the creature’s space. The creature can make a Strength or Dexterity vs. Reflex attack (as a stan- dard action with no penalty) to slide you into an adjacent square and end this effect.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: Allies of the target creature can attack you without penalty.

name: Sudden Storm
flavor: With a wave of your hand, you create an area of torrential rain that creatures have difficulty passing through.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The burst creates a zone of wind and rain that lasts until the end of your next turn. Squares in the zone are difficult terrain and are lightly obscured. As a move action, you can move the zone up to 5 squares.

name: Foil the Lock
flavor: You tug on a lock a certain way, and just like that, it snaps open.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Thievery.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: On your next action, gain a +10 power bonus when you make a Thievery check to open a lock. If the check succeeds, the lock opens at once.

name: Distintegrate
flavor: You fire a green ray from your wand. Whatever the emerald beam hits disappears in a puff of gray dust.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 5d10 + Intelligence modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends). If the target saves, it takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: 3d10 + Intelligence modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

sections.title: Special
sections.content: You don’t need to make an attack roll to hit an unattended object with this power.

name: Mordenkainen's Lucubration
flavor: Your mastery of the arcane arts allows you to push your mind far beyond its limits, tapping into reserves of magic that allow your spells to endure.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Until the end of the encounter or until you become unconscious, your arcane powers that can be sustained instead last until the end of the encounter.

name: Phantom Reality
flavor: You create an intricate illusion in your enemy's mind, convincing it that friends are foes and leading it wherever you desire.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: The target is affected by phantom reality (save ends). While it is affected by phantom reality, whenever the target makes a melee or ranged attack roll, you can change the target of that attack. If it makes an area attack, you choose the attack's origin square if applicable. The target cannot attack itself in this way. Also, whenever the target moves, you can slide it 4 squares after it completes its movement.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Until the end of your next turn, whenever the target makes a melee or ranged attack roll, you can change the target of that attack. If it makes an area attack, you choose the attack's origin square if applicable. The target cannot attack itself in this way.

name: Miasma of Enfeeblement
flavor: Black dust whirls up around your foes, sapping their strength and clouding their vision.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 5d6 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The burst creates a zone of clinging black dust that blocks lie of sight for all creatures damaged by this power until the end of your next turn.

name: Light
flavor: With a wave of your hand, you cause a bright light to appear on the tip of your staff, upon some other object, or in a nearby space.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You cause the target to shed bright light. The light fills the target’s square and all squares within 4 squares of it. The light lasts for 5 minutes. Putting out the light is a free action.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: You can have only one light cantrip active at a time. If you create a new light, your previously cast light winks out.

name: Priest's Shield
flavor: You utter a minor defensive prayer as you attack with your weapon.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you and one adjacent ally gain a +1 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.

name: Sly Flourish
flavor: A distracting flourish causes the enemy to forget the blade at his throat.
requirements: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier + Charisma modifier damage.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier + Charisma modifier at 21st level.

name: Eldritch Blast
flavor: You fire a bolt of dark, crackling eldritch energy at your foe.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d10 + Charisma or Constitution modifier damage.

Increase damage to 2d10 + Charisma or Constitution modifier at 21st level.

sections.title: Special
sections.content:
At 1st level. you determine whether you use Charisma or Constitution to attack with this power. Once you make that choice, you can’t change it later.

This power counts as a ranged basic attack. When a power allows you to make a ranged basic attack, you can use this power.

name: Reaping Strike
flavor: You punctuate your scything attacks with wicked jabs and small cutting blows that slip through your enemy’s defenses.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half Strength modifier damage. If you’re wielding a two-handed weapon, you deal damage equal to your Strength modifier.

name: Sacred Flame
flavor: Sacred light shines from above, searing a single enemy with its radiance while at the same time aiding an ally with its beneficent power.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and one ally you can see chooses either to gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + one-half your level, or to make a saving throw.

name: Careful Attack
flavor: You study the enemy, looking for a gap in his defenses. Only when you find it do you strike.
requirements: You must be wielding to melee weapons or a ranged weapon.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] damage (melee) or 1[W] damage (ranged).

Increase damage to 2[W] damage (melee) or 2[W] damage (ranged) at 21st level.

targets.attack: Strength +2 vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity + 2 vs. AC (ranged).

name: Vicious Mockery
flavor: You unleash a string of insults at your foe, weaving them with bardic magic to send the creature into a blind rage.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Level 21: 2d6 + Charisma modifier damage.

name: Chameleon
flavor: You blend into your surroundings.
trigger: You are hidden and lose cover or concealment against an opponent

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Make a Stealth check. Until the end of your next turn, you remain hidden if a creature that has a clear line of sight to you does not beat your check result with its Perception check. If at the end of your turn you do not have cover or concealment against a creature, that creature automatically notices you.

name: Speed of Thought
flavor: You move in the blink o f an eye, reacllin8 your foes before they can draw their weapons.
trigger: You roll initiative

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You move a number of squares equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: You can use this power even if you're surprised.

name: Ardent Surge
flavor: You send a surge of powerfol emotion that revives a falterine ally.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
The target can spend a healing surge and regain 1d6 additional hit points.

_Level 6:_ 2d6 additional hit points.

_Level 11 :_ 3d6 additional hit points.

_Level 16:_ 4d6 additional hit points.

_Level 11:_ Sd6 additional hit points.

_Level 26:_ 6d6 additional hit points.

**Mantle of Clarity:** The target gains a + 1 bonus to all de­fenses until the end of your next turn. 

**Mantle of Elation:** The target gains a + 1 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: You can use this power twice per encounter, but only once per round. At 16th level, you can use this power three times per encounter, but only once per round.

name: Dazing Strike
flavor: An expert strike catches your foe by surprise and leaves him reeling from the pain.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

name: Avenging Echo
flavor: Your weapon sweeps in a deadly arc, leaving in its wake swirling radiant energy that keeps your foes at bay.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to you or that hits or misses you takes 5 radiant damage.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: Censure of Retribution: The radiant damage equals 5 + your Intelligence modifier.

name: Witchfire
flavor: From the mystic energy of the Feywild, you draw a brilliant white flame and set it in your enemy's mind and body. Rivulets of argent fire stream up into the air from his eyes, mouth, and hands; agony disrupts his very thoughts.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
2d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

**Fey Pact:** The penalty to attack rolls is equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier.

name: Master of Deceit
flavor: The line between truth and deception is thin, and you cross it with ease.
trigger: You roll a Bluff check and dislike the result
prerequisites: You must be trained in Bluff.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Reroll the Bluff check. You decide whether to make the reroll before the DM announces the result.

name: Quick Fingers
flavor: You can pilfer a coin pouch in the blink of an eye.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Thievery.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Make a Thievery check as part of this action, even if the check is normally a standard action.

name: Topple Over
flavor: Balance and momentum are your allies as you lunge forward, strike deftly, and knock your opponent to the ground.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: Brutal Scoundrel: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Strength modifier.

name: Dance of Steel
flavor: Weaving your weapon in a graceful figure-eight, you lash out with a sudden attack.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: If you're wielding a polearm or a heavy blade, the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

name: Blade Sweep
flavor: Though the fury of your attack is directed at a single foe, no nearby enemy is spared your wrath.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each bloodied enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

**Rageblood Vigor:** Each enemy adjacent to you that is not bloodied also takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

name: Ignoble Escape
flavor: With nimble ease, you sidestep one perilous situation after another.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Acrobatics.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: If you are marked, end that condition. You can shift a number of squares equal to your speed.

name: Sand in the Eyes
flavor: You scoop up a handful of sand or dirt or pebbles, strike your foe, and throw the grit in his face to blind him.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: ￼1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

name: Thunder Smite
flavor: Your weapon flashes as it strikes, and moments later, a peal of thunder slams into your foe.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.

targets.attack: Strength vs. AC (can score a critical hit against a marked enemy on a roll of 19-20)

name: Feast of Violence
flavor: You drop your guard as you come close for your attack, drawing primal strength from the violence directed at you.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: You can choose to provoke opportunity attacks when you make this attack. If you do so, you gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each creature that attacks you, and the attack deals 1[W] extra damage.

name: Stunning Strike
flavor: A well-timed attack leaves your enemy flailing helplessly for a few critical seconds.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

name: Leaping Dodge
flavor: You leap out of harm’s way just in time to avoid an attack.
trigger: An enemy targets you with an attack
prerequisites: You must be trained in Athletics.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Make an Athletics check to jump with a +5 power bonus and move the appropriate distance.

name: Force Volley
flavor: Silvery missiles spring from your fingertips and streak across the battlefield, striking your enemies with staggering force.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

targets.attack: Intelligence vs. Reflex, one attack per target

name: Soul Fire
flavor: You crook your hand in a mystical gesture, and your foes shriek in agony as their souls are consumed by hidden flame.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier fire and necrotic damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

name: Easy Target
flavor: You deal a staggering blow to your enemy, setting it up for future attacks.
requirements: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed and grants combat advantage to you (save ends both).

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

name: Comeback Strike
flavor: A timely strike against a hated foe invigorates you, giving you the strength and resolve to fight on.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can spend a healing surge.

name: Flaming Sphere
flavor: You conjure a rolling ball of fire and control where it goes.
sustainText: You can sustain this power until the end of the encounter. As a standard action, you can make another attack with the sphere.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You conjure a Medium flaming sphere in an unoccupied square within range, and the sphere attacks an adjacent creature. Any creature that starts its turn next to the flaming sphere takes 1d4 + Intelligence modifier fire damage. As a move action, you can move the sphere up to 6 squares.

targets.target: One creature adjacent to the flaming sphere

name: Expeditious Retreat
flavor: Your form blurs as you hastily withdraw from the battlefield.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You shift up to twice your speed.

name: Clever Riposte
flavor: You follow up a fierce attack with a series of quick, painful strikes woven between your enemy’s attacks.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Until the end of the encounter, the target takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier each time it attacks you, and you can shift as an immediate reaction after such an attack.

name: Consecrated Ground
flavor: With a wave of your hand, jagged lines of radiant light spread across the ground around you like a crackling web, moving at your whim. Enemies that stand upon this ground suffer the wrath of your deity.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The burst creates a zone of sanctified ground that lasts until the end of your next turn. You can move the origin square of the zone 3 squares as a move action. Enemies that start their turns while within the zone take 1d6 + your Charisma modifier radiant damage. You and any allies who are bloodied and start their turns within the zone regain hit points equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.

name: Stinking Cloud
flavor: You call forth a thick cloud of bilious yellow vapors. The foul fumes overwhelm any creature within.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier poison damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The burst creates a zone of poisonous vapor that blocks line of sight until the end of your next turn. Creatures that enter the zone or start their turns there take 1d10 + Intelligence modifier poison damage. As a move action, you can move the zone up to 6 squares.

name: Evade Ambush
flavor: You are the eyes and ears of the group, always alert for the telltale signs of an ambush.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: At the start of a surprise round in which any allies are surprised, use this power to allow a number of allies equal to you Wisdom modifier to avoid being surprised.

name: Wrath of the Divine
flavor: Suffering a foe's lucky attack, you call on your god to visit your pain upon the one you have sworn to kill.
trigger: An enemy scores a critical hit against you.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The target takes radiant damage equal to the critical hit's damage.

targets.target: Your oath of enmity target in burst

name: Crimson Edge
flavor: You deal your enemy a vicious wound that continues to bleed, and like a shark, you circle in for the kill.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing damage equal to 5 + your Strength modifier and grants combat advantage to you (save ends both).

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and no ongoing damage.

name: Certain Freedom
flavor: You are as slippery as an eel.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Acrobatics.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You automatically succeed on an Acrobatics check to escape from a grab or to escape from restraints.

name: Shooter's Nemesis
flavor: The fact that your enemy is too cowardly to close to melee swells your confidence.
trigger: You are hit by a ranged attack.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to twice your Wisdom modifier.

name: Unyielding Avalanche
flavor: You twirl your weapon about and test the defenses of nearby foes while expertly parrying their blows.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You gain regeneration equal to you Constitution modifier, a +1 power bonus to AC, and a +1 power bonus to saving throws. Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage and is slowed until the end of its turn, as long as you are able to make opportunity attacks.

name: Edvard's Black Tentacles
flavor: Wriggling, ebon tentacles of necrotic energy erupt from the ground, grasping toward every creature within reach.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
The burst creates a zone of difficult terrain that lasts until the end of your next turn.
Sustain Minor: When you sustain the power, repeat the attack against any creature within the zone that is not immobilized, and deal 1d10 necrotic damage to creatures that are immobilized.

name: Maelstrom of Chaos
flavor: Arcane winds and a hailstorm of force energy surrounds you, battering your enemies and teleporting them from one place to another.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you can teleport the target to a location of your choice within the burst.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and no teleportation.

name: Elemental Maw
flavor: You call up a spinning vortex of elemental energy that inexorably draws everything around it toward seeming destruction.
damageTypes: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Thunder

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 6d6 + Intelligence modifier damage of a type chosen from the following list: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. In addition, the target is pulled 2 squares toward the maw’s origin square.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and no pull.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: This attack’s origin square becomes a vortex of energy. The burst creates an area of difficult terrain. The effect remains until the end of your next turn. Any creature that is pulled into the vortex takes 3d6 + Intelligence modifier damage of a type chosen from the following list: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. In addition, you teleport that creature to a square within 20 squares of you. The creature arrives at its destination prone and dazed until the start of your next turn.

name: Meteor Swarm
flavor: Fiery orbs rain down from above, shrieking loudly as they fall. They smash into your foes, obliterating them in a storm of fire and scorching the ground.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 8d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage.

name: Lance of Faith
flavor: A brilliant ray of light sears your foe with golden radiance. Sparkles of light linger around the target, guiding your ally’s attack.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and one ally you can see gains a +2 power bonus to his or her next attack roll against the target.

Increase damage to 2d8 + Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

name: Riposte Strike
flavor: With a calculated strike, you leave your foe vulnerable to an adroit riposte should he dare attack you.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target attacks you before the start of your next turn, you make your riposte against the target as an immediate interrupt: a Strength vs. AC attack that deals 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier and riposte to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.

name: Storm Walk
flavor: The thunder of your steps batters your foe.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d8 + Charisma modifier damage.

_Level 21_:  2d8 + Charisma modifier damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Before or after you attack, shift 1 square.

name: Cleave
flavor: You hit one enemy, then cleave into another.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.

name: Lightning Strike
flavor: Lightning strikes your foe and then ricochets to another enemy.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d8 + Charisma modifier lightning damage. A creature of your choice other than the target and within 10 squares of the target takes lightning damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

_Level 21_: 2d8+Charisma modifier lightning damage.

**Storm Magic**: You can apply your Storm Power bonus either to the damage roll against the target or to the damage taken by the enemy within 10 squares of the target.

name: Holy Strike
flavor: You strike an enemy with your weapon, which ignites with holy light.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Strength modifier radiant damage. If you marked the target, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.

name: Misdirected Mark
flavor: You conceal your arcane attack, tricking your foe into thinking the attack came from one of your allies.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is marked by an ally within 5 squares of you until the end of your next turn.

Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage.

name: Great Leap
flavor: You leap a great distance without a running start.
prerequisites: You must be trained in Athletics.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Make a high jump or a long jump. Determine the DC of the Athletics check as though you had a running start. The distance you jump can exceed your speed.

name: Battle Resilience
flavor: You steel yourselffor battle, 8irdin8 yourself a8ainst your foe's initial assault.
trigger:
An attack hits or misses you for the first time during
an encounter

sections.title: Special
sections.content:
Until the end ofyour next turn, you gain resistance
to all damage equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

* Level 11: Resist 6 + your Wisdom modifier.
* Level 21: Resist 9 + your Wisdom modifier.

name: Ardent Alacrity
flavor: As you take a hit, your emotional energy inspires your allies.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Each target can use a free action either to shift 1 square or to move half his or her speed.

name: Abjure Undead
flavor: You send a brilliant ray of radiant power at an undead foe,  compelling it to stagger toward you.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
3d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you pull the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier. The target is also immobilized until the end of your next turn.

* Level 5:  4d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
* Level 11: 5d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
* Level 15: 6d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
* Level 21: 7d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
* Level 25: 8d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and you pull the target 1 square.

name: Thunder Slam
flavor: A shock wave of sound slams into the enemy.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d10 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 3 squares.

name: Evasive Strike
flavor: You confound enemies by weaving through the battlefield unscathed as you make your attacks.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged).

targets.attack: Strength +2 vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity + 2 vs. AC (ranged).

name: Ethereal Stride
flavor: You shift your body out of phase with the world for an instant, teleporting a short distance. When you reappear, you are still somewhat out of phase and difficult to harm or hinder for a short time.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You can teleport 3 squares, and you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

name: Spatial Trip
flavor: You spin around, releasing a blaze of golden energy. As you finish your revolution, you disappear and reappear a short distance away.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You teleport a number of squares equal to half your speed.

name: Setup Strike
