flavor: You land a calculated blow that causes your enemy to drop his guard, leaving him vulnerable to subsequent attacks.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

name: Daunting Light
flavor: A burning column of light engulfs your foe. Its brilliance burns and hinders your foe's defense for a short time.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: One ally you can see gains combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.

name: Cunning Ferocity
flavor: The mark of your weapon on your target's hide gives strength to your allies' attack against the same foe.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and each ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.

**Virtue of Cunning:** The bonus to damage rolls equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

name: Unbreakable
flavor: You steel yourself against a brutal attack.
trigger: You are hit by an attack.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Reduce the damage from the attack by 5 + your Constitution modifier.

name: Rogue's Luck
flavor: A gifted rogue can turn failure into fortune.
requirements: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content:
Make a secondary attack against the target.

**Artful Dodger:** You gain a bonus to the attack roll for the secondary attack equal to your Charisma modifier. (1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.)

sections.title: Secondary Hit
sections.content: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

name: Iron Bulwark
flavor: You use your weapon or shield to parry one blow after another, denying your foes the satisfaction of getting in a solid hit against you.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You gain a +1 power bonus to AC (or a +2 bonus if you're using a shield) until the end of your next turn.

name: Distracting Shout
flavor: Your shout draws the enemy's attention so that your allies can maneuver around the foe, letting them get in close or get away.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and the target takes a -5 penalty to opportunity attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

**Virtue of Cunning:** The penalty to opportunity attack rolls equals 4 + your Intelligence modifier.

name: Fool's Opportunity
flavor: You bait your foe into attacking you, and then turn his blow straight back at him.
requirements: You must be wielding a light blade.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: The target takes damage as if it were hit by its own melee basic attack. If you have combat advantage against the target, you can add your Sneak Attack damage.

name: Mesmeric Hold
flavor: You immobilize your foes by commanding them to remain still.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: If you target only one creature with this power, you gain a +4 power bonus to the attack roll.

targets.attack: Intelligence vs. Will, one attack per target

name: Exacting Strike
flavor: You trade damage for accuracy to land a much-needed hit on your opponent.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

name: Trick of Knowledge
flavor: Your vast learning grants you different insightful advantages in different situations.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
You make an Arcana check and gain a benefit based on your check result until the end of the encounter.
30 or lower: No effect
31-35: +5 bonus to saving throws
36-40: +2 bonus to all defenses
41-45: +2 bonus to attack rolls with arcane powers
46-50: Make saving throws at the start of you turn instead of at the end of your turn
51-55: Pick two benefits you can gain from a roll of 31 through 50
56-60 Pick three benefits you can gain from a roll of 31 through 50
61 or higher: Gain all four benefits you can gain from a roll of 31 through 50

name: Blinding Barrage
flavor: A rapid barrage of projectiles leaves your enemies clearing the blood from their eyes.
requirements:
ou must be wielding a crossbow, a light
thrown weapon, or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and the target is not blinded.

targets.target: Each enemy in blast you can see

name: Beacon of Hope
flavor: A burst of divine energy harms your foes and heals your allies. The radiant energy lingers around your holy symbol and improves your healing powers for the rest of the battle.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: The target is weakened until the end of its next turn.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You and all your allies in the burst regain 5 hit points, and your healing powers restore +5 hit points until the end of the encounter.

name: Acid Arrow
flavor: A shimmering arrow of green, glowing liquid streaks to your target and bursts in a spray of sizzling acid.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends). Make a secondary attack.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and ongoing 2 acid damage to primary target (save ends), and no secondary attack.

sections.title: Secondary Hit
sections.content: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).

targets.target: Each creature adjacent to the primary target

name: Martyr's Blessing
flavor: You step into an attack made against an ally to save your comrade.
trigger: An adjacent ally is hit by a melee or a ranged attack.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You are hit by the attack instead.

name: Shield of Faith
flavor: A gleaming shield of divine energy appears over you, granting you and nearby allies protection against attacks.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The targets gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of the encounter.

targets.target: You and each ally in burst

name: Oath of Consuming Light
flavor: You place a burning mark of divine radiance on your foe as you swear an oath to destroy this creature. With every wound you inflict on the creature, the burning mark erupts in searing light.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
2d10 + Wisdom radiant damage. Whenever you hit the target with a divine power, the target takes 1d6 extra radiant damage (save ends).

Aftereffect: Whenever you hit the target with a divine power, the target takes 1d4 extra radiant damage (save ends).

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage. Whenever you hit the target with a divine power, the target takes 1d4 extra radiant damage (save ends).

name: Crown of Madness
flavor: You cause an illusory, twisted crown to appear around the target's head. Under its psychic assault, your enemy loses the ability to distinguish friend from foe.
sustainText: The target makes a melee basic attack against one of its adjacent allies of your choice (save ends).

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage.

name: Thunder Hawk Rage
flavor: Your thunderous attack dazes your foe as you channel the great spirit hawk whose wings rumble across the sky. Your screaming charge blasts your enemies with thunder.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and the primary target is dazed (save ends).

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage.

sections.title: Secondary Hit
sections.content: You knock the secondary target prone.

name: Indomitable Shift
flavor: You pound across the battlefield, leaving no opening as you move and drawing strength from the numbers arrayed against you.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You shift a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier. You gain 1d10 temporary hit points plus 1 additional temporary hit point for each enemy within 2 squares of you.

name: Invisibility
flavor: A creature you choose vanishes from sight.
sustainText: If the target is within range, you can sustain the effect.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The target is invisible until the end of your next turn. If the target attacks, the target becomes visible.

name: Blade of Guilt
flavor: At the touch of your weapon, your foe relives its misdeeds. Only by standing still can it keep the painful visions at bay.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. The target takes 5 psychic damage for each square it enters willingly (save ends).

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes 5 psychic damage for each square it enters willingly.

name: River of Life
flavor: Divine power flows through you, allowing you to shrug off injury after injury.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You gain regeneration 5 until the end of the encounter.

name: Slaying Strike
flavor: A ruthless strike yields great rewards, for after death comes the looting.
requirements:
You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade,
or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: If the target is bloodied, this attack does 5[W] + Dexterity modifier + Strength modifier damage on a hit (half damage on a miss) and can score a critical hit on a roll of 17–20.

name: Clever Escape
flavor: As your foes close in for the kill, you buy the time for escape with a cunningly crafted duplicate of yourself.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
You become invisible and teleport 6 squares. You leave behind an illusory image of yourself in the space you occupied. The illusion stands in place, takes no actions, and uses your defenses if it is attacked. It lasts until the end of the encounter or until it is touched or hit by an attack. Your invisibility lasts until the end of your next turn or until you make an attack roll.
A creature can recognize the illusion by making a successful Insight check (DC 15 + one-half your level + your Intelligence modifier).

name: Snake's Retreat
flavor: After striking boldly, you frustrate your foe by shifting away just as he’s about to attack you.
requirements: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 6[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: When the target makes a melee attack or a ranged attack against you, you can shift 1 square as an immediate interrupt. The target can make a saving throw to end this effect.

name: Reaper's Stance
flavor: Every enemy within your reach falls victim to the ruthless precision of your attack and suffers bleeding wounds.

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Whenever you use a fighter power, you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19-20, and you gain a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Dexterity modifier. Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage and ongoing 10 damage (save ends), as long as you are able to make opportunity attacks.

name: Legion's Hold
flavor: Your eyes darken, becoming black orbs as you command your enemies to stop in their tracks.

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).

sections.title: Miss
sections.content: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
